text: We're a BPO contact center
that supports health systems nationwide
for patient families as well as end users
leveraging contact center technology.
Our business is volatile.
Sometimes we take 75,000 calls a month
in a variety of channels.

Sometimes we'll go up to
150,000 and I'll have to scale
for a two week or a one month window,

and our partner didn't
allow us to scale well.
So we looked to Amazon Connect
to be a consumption based service
to help us scale up and scale down,
with no end user license fees.
We saved over 50% of our annual charges.

But most importantly
too, we looked at Amazon
as being an innovation partner

and help us to have a more
seamless agent guided experience.

And we were able to implement
several technologies such

as Amazon Connect, Connect
agent workspace, cases,
and guides to reduce our clicks per call,
improve our handle times,

and ultimately that creates
great service for
our end customer as well.
We were a 20 click system,
getting ourselves down to eight clicks.
It's over 50% efficiency
for our agent workforce in the BPO space.
Not only did it save us money,
but it also helped us improve outcomes

for the health systems we
service by providing a faster

user experience for our agents
to perform their business functions

to support those health
systems nationwide.
